item.title: 美联储加息对减缓美国房市有多大作用？
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们关注劳拉-柯蒂斯关于美国住房问题的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at reporting by Laura Curtis on US housing. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧盟技术倡导者呼吁通过 EuroStack 实现更大程度的自力更生
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，吉安-沃尔皮切利（Gian Volpicelli）从布鲁塞尔报道了倡导者、政策制定者和学术界为推动欧洲数字独立（尤其是与美国大型科技公司的独立）所做的努力：EuroStack。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg's journalists around the world. Today, Gian Volpicelli reports from Brussels on an effort by advocates, policymakers and academics to push European digital independence, particularly from the Big Tech companies in the US, under a new banner: EuroStack.】

item.title: 世界如何应对特朗普的贸易动荡
item.description: 世界各国政府正争先恐后地准备应对唐纳德-特朗普的关税冲击。【原文：Governments around the world are scrambling to prepare for Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率突破 7%，创去年 5 月以来新高
item.description: 上周，美国抵押贷款利率突破 7%，达到 5 月初以来的最高水平，并延续了长达数月的升势，这有可能抑制房地产市场。【原文：US mortgage rates topped 7% last week, reaching the highest level since early May and extending a months-long advance that risks restraining the housing market.】

item.title: 英国房价出现近两年来最快增长
item.description: 官方数据显示，在收入增加和赶在税收截止日期前购房者进入市场之后，英国房价以近两年来最快的年度速度增长。【原文：UK house prices increased at the fastest annual pace in almost two years, according to official data, after rising incomes and a rush to beat a tax deadline brought buyers into the market.】

item.title: 英伟达的 800% 反弹遭遇绊脚石
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）公司在过去两年中的涨幅高达 800%，但却遇到了绊脚石。【原文：Nvidia’s scorching 800% rally in the past two years has hit a stumbling block.】

item.title: 摩尔多瓦德拉古称俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司危机将使通胀率超过 10
item.description: 摩尔多瓦最高央行行长表示，由于俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）决定切断对一个重要发电分离地区的天然气供应，引发能源危机升级，摩尔多瓦今年将面临两位数的通货膨胀。【原文：Moldova is bracing for double-digit inflation this year amid an escalating energy crisis triggered by Gazprom PJSC’s decision to cut off gas supply to a key power-generating breakaway region, the country’s top central banker said.】

item.title: 斗山将在布拉格上市，这是 2020 年以来首次大规模 IPO
item.description: 蒸汽轮机制造商斗山斯柯达电力公司宣布计划发行少数股权后，布拉格证券交易所正在为四年多来首次大规模首次公开募股做准备。【原文：The Prague Stock Exchange is preparing for its first major initial public offering in more than four years after steam-turbine manufacturer Doosan Skoda Power announced plans to float a minority stake.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率在关键通胀数据公布前徘徊在 5%左右
item.description: 周三，美国消费者物价指数的新数据将把本已高企的美国政府债券收益率推得更高，甚至超过 5%的关键门槛。【原文：A fresh read on US consumer prices Wednesday stands to push already elevated US government bond yields even higher — beyond crucial 5% thresholds.】

item.title: 特朗普削减联邦工作岗位的计划使黑人工人面临风险
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）缩减联邦劳动力的计划将对黑人就业产生不同程度的影响，同时可能削弱许多黑人家庭世代依赖的经济流动性的关键渠道。【原文：President–elect Donald Trump’s plans to shrink the federal workforce would have disparate impacts on Black employment, while potentially eroding a key conduit to economic mobility that many Black families have relied on for generations.】

item.title: Investcorp 两名信贷交易高管即将离职
item.description: Investcorp Holdings 的两名信贷高管即将离职，这是中东最大的另类资产管理公司近几个月来的最新高管变动。【原文：Two of Investcorp Holdings’ top credit executives are leaving, marking the latest executive changes at the Middle East’s biggest alternative asset manager in recent months.】

item.title: 印度小组寻求对美国谋杀阴谋参与者采取法律行动
item.description: 印度政府的一个小组在调查了来自美国的涉嫌犯罪的信息后，建议对一个人采取法律行动。【原文：An Indian government panel recommended legal action against an individual after investigating information from the US about alleged crimes.】

item.title: 阿布扎比第一银行高管不断流失
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着海湾地区最大的贷款机构之一阿布扎比第一银行（First Abu Dhabi Bank Pjsc）不断面临高级管理人员外流的问题，两名高级管理人员即将离职。【原文：Two senior executives are leaving First Abu Dhabi Bank Pjsc as one of the Gulf’s largest lenders continues to grapple with an exodus of senior managers, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞银称新兴市场因特朗普关税面临进一步损失
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，由于近期的大跌尚未完全计入唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能征收关税所带来的风险，新兴市场股票和货币很容易遭受进一步损失。【原文：Emerging-market equities and currencies are vulnerable to further losses as the recent selloff hasn’t fully priced in risks arising from Donald Trump’s potential tariffs, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 贝莱德在韦德曼离职之际晋升高管
item.description: 在曾被视为首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）潜在接班人的马克-维德曼（Mark Wiedman）宣布离职后，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is elevating several senior executives to expand its business in the Americas and with key institutional clients, following the announced departure of Mark Wiedman, once seen as a potential successor to Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink.】

item.title: 贝莱德的芬克称客户现金创纪录 "只是开始
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）年度客户现金收入达到创纪录的 6,410 亿美元，彰显了该公司在股票和债券、指数基金和主动型基金方面的全球影响力，以及在快速增长且利润丰厚的私人资产市场的影响力。【原文：BlackRock Inc. hauled in an annual record of $641 billion in client cash, underlining the firm’s global reach across stocks and bonds, index and active funds and increasingly the fast-growing — and lucrative — market for private assets.】

item.title: 初创公司融资 2 亿美元让长毛象复活
item.description:
Colossal生物科学公司目前估值102亿美元，其目标是在2028年前生产出猛犸象。【原文：

Colossal Biosciences, now valued at $10.2 billion, aims to produce a mammoth by 2028.

】

item.title: 芝加哥建筑业亿万富翁加深对数据中心的押注
item.description: 由亿万富翁鲍勃-克拉克（Bob Clark）领导的芝加哥建筑商克莱科公司（Clayco），正准备在数据中心的蓬勃发展中抢占先机。【原文：Clayco, a Chicago-based builder led by billionaire Bob Clark, is positioning itself to grab for more of the boom in data centers.】

item.title: NetApp 向 Thoma Bravo 的 Flexera 出售部分软件资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，NetApp 公司已同意将其近年来收购的云软件资产组合出售给 Thoma Bravo 支持的 Flexera 公司。【原文：NetApp Inc. has agreed to sell a portfolio of cloud software assets it acquired in recent years to Thoma Bravo-backed Flexera, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管被控滥用劳工权益，比亚迪仍坚持巴西生产计划
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司重申了今年在巴西开始生产电动汽车的承诺，尽管当局指控这家中国汽车制造商的一家分包商存在滥用劳动力的行为。【原文：BYD Co. reiterated its commitment to commence production of electric vehicles in Brazil this year, despite authorities accusing one of the Chinese carmaker’s subcontractors of labor abuses.】

item.title: 肖尔茨内阁授权军方射杀不明无人机
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）内阁通过立法，允许德国武装部队击落涉嫌监视军事基地、工业设施和其他重要基础设施的不明无人机。【原文：Chancellor Olaf Scholz’s cabinet passed legislation that will enable Germany’s armed forces to shoot down unidentified drones suspected of spying on military bases, industrial facilities and other critical infrastructure.】

item.title: 南非非法采矿作业造成的死亡人数达到 51 人
item.description: 安全部队表示，在与南非当局长达数月的对峙中死亡的非法矿工人数已增至 51 人。【原文：The number of illegal miners who’ve died in a months-long standoff with the South African authorities increased to 51, the security forces said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯亿万富翁向英国最高法院提出解除制裁的最后请求
item.description: 罗曼-阿布拉莫维奇的一位亿万富翁盟友在英国最高法院最后一次尝试解除英国对他的制裁，认为这些措施的效果是 "破坏了他的声誉"。【原文：A billionaire ally of Roman Abramovich made a final attempt to lift British sanctions against him at the UK’s top court, arguing that the effect of the measures has been to “shatter his reputation.”】

item.title: 荷兰对部分 ASML 芯片工具实施美国出口管制
item.description: 荷兰收紧了出口控制规则，要求 ASML Holding NV 为其部分工具向荷兰政府而非华盛顿申请许可证。【原文：The Netherlands tightened export control rules to make ASML Holding NV apply for licenses with the Dutch government instead of Washington for some of its tools.】

item.title: 移民如何影响美国经济
item.description:
移民真的抢走了美国人的工作吗？更多的移民真的意味着更低的工资吗？以下是关于这个国家最具分歧的问题之一的无厘头指南。【原文：

Do immigrants really take jobs from Americans? And does more immigration really mean lower wages? Here’s a no-nonsense guide to one of the country’s most divisive issues.

】

item.title: 保加利亚为打破政治僵局推进组阁工作
item.description: 保加利亚中右翼政党提议组建联合政府，打破了僵局，为这个巴尔干国家提供了获得有效多数的机会，以解决腐败和采用欧元等问题。【原文：Bulgaria’s center-right party moved to break an impasse as it proposed a coalition government, offering the Balkan nation the chance at a functioning majority to tackle issues such as corruption and euro adoption.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与伊拉克签署重振基尔库克油田的大部分商业条款
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）和伊拉克政府周二就重启基尔库克油田的大部分商业条款达成一致，朝着有望在今年年初达成最终协议的方向又迈进了一步。【原文：BP and the Iraqi government agreed the majority of commercial terms toward reviving the Kirkuk oil field on Tuesday, further progress toward a final agreement that is expected early this year.】

item.title: 英伟达 3 万亿美元涨势岌岌可危，华尔街却无动于衷
item.description: 自 ChatGPT 助推人工智能狂潮以来的两年时间里，英伟达公司的市值增长了 3 万亿美元，超过了历史上任何股票在如此短时间内的涨幅。但现在，这家芯片制造商的格局正在发生变化。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s $3 trillion run-up in market value in the two years since ChatGPT helped trigger an AI frenzy is bigger than any stock rally in history in such a short time span. But the landscape is now changing for the chipmaker.】

item.title: 彭博民调：瑞典央行分析师对宽松步伐意见不一
item.description: 接受彭博社调查的经济学家对瑞典央行是否会在第一季度降息一到两个季度点的问题意见不一。【原文：Economists surveyed by Bloomberg are divided on whether Sweden’s central bank will deliver one or two quarter-point interest-rate cuts during the first quarter.】

item.title: 安巴尼的 Jio Finance 正在与贷款人洽谈首次债务出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由亚洲最富有的商人穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的影子贷款公司吉奥金融有限公司（Jio Finance Ltd. ）正在与几家贷款机构进行谈判，以首次进军本币债务市场。【原文：Jio Finance Ltd., a shadow lender owned by Asia’s richest businessman Mukesh Ambani, is in talks with several lenders to make its first foray into the local currency debt market, according to people familiar with the matter.】
